text: Gétatchèw Mèkurya (Amharic: ጌታቸው መኩሪያ) (14 March 1935 – 4 April 2016)According to the official The Ex website and the Bimhuis website, both retrieved 4 April 2016. was an Ethiopian jazz saxophonist. Mekurya reached an international audience when his album Negus of Ethiopian Sax was re-released as part of the Ethiopiques CD series. Mekurya's playing style has been compared to free jazz. Mekurya died in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia from a leg infection caused by diabetes on 4 April 2016, aged 81. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Ethiopian people Category:Jazz musicians Category:Saxophonists
title: Getatchew Mekurya
